10.eng-name: The Book of Leading the Prayer (Al-Imamah)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Uthman bin 'Affan said:"I heard the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) say: 'Whoever does wudu' properly, then walks to (attend) the prescribed prayer, and prays with the people or with the congregation or in the Masjid, Allah will forgive him his sins

chapter.eng-name: "Catching the congregation" (when is one regarded As having caught up with the congregation)
